name: Nanotechnology 2019
content: Larix team is proud to host and welcome you to the Nanotech 2019 which will be held from June 20-21, 2019 in Singapore. The annual Nanotech 2019 Conference is the premier international forum to present and discuss progress in research, development, standards, and applications of the topics related to the Nanoscience and Nanotechnology and their related fields, will offer high quality technical activities, including research sessions (General & Keynote presentations), poster sessions, workshops, Young researchers demonstrations, an industry track for business attendees with the collaboration of different exhibitors and sponsors worldwide. Nanotech 2019 will be a great conference for sharing the latest insights of academic and industrial research as well as to experience the unique and beautiful environment of Singapore, a city which has been at the heart of the artistic, cultural, and scientific development since many centuries. We look forward to welcoming you to an inspiring, educational, and enjoyable program in vibrant, beautiful and multicultural Singapore city. Sincerely, Organizing Committee, Nanotech 2019
